org.modelio.api.diagram.IDiagramHandle

  • Packages that use IDiagramHandle 
    Package Description
    org.modelio.api.diagram  
    org.modelio.api.diagram.tools  

    • Uses of IDiagramHandle in org.modelio.api.diagram

      Methods in org.modelio.api.diagram that return IDiagramHandle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDiagramHandle IDiagramService.getDiagramHandle(AbstractDiagram diagram)
      Get a diagram handle on 'diagram'.
      It opens a new diagram editor in Modelio, or select it if already opened.
